mapper.update: UPDATE tb_account SET user_name = #{userName}, total_amount = #{totalAmount}, available = #{available}, frozen_amount = #{frozenAmount}, due_settle_amount = #{dueSettleAmount}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT CLIENTID, APPTYPE,ISAVOIDINGTONE from app_au_user_token aut, app_au_token aat ,app_biz_shop_user_role bsur where aut.TID=aat.ID and bsur.UID=aut.UID and bsur.SID=#{sid} AND aut.`STATUS`=1
SELECT a.CLIENTID,a.APPTYPE FROM app_au_token a LEFT JOIN app_au_user_token b ON a.ID=b.TID WHERE b.UID=#{uid} AND b.`STATUS`=1
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM tb_push_message_record WHERE transaction_number=#{transactionNumber}
SELECT a.CLIENTID,a.APPTYPE FROM app_au_token a LEFT JOIN app_au_user_token b ON a.ID=b.TID WHERE b.UID=#{uid} AND b.`STATUS`=1 AND a.ACCESSTOKEN != #{accessToken}
